shapes

Class TextStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.TextStyle

  • public class TextStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to change the visual style of text displayed in the game. Can be used to customize text's font, size, color, etc.

    There are a few places you can display text, including Shape.say(java.lang.String), Game.setTitle(java.lang.String, int), Game.setSubtitle(java.lang.String, int), and Counter.

    Example usage:

    TextStyle speechStyle = new TextStyle("Helvetica", 12, Color.BLACK);
    circle.setSpeechStyle(speechStyle);
    circle.say("Hello, world!");
